en.Settings(Q/Esc)[2]: In any page, quit to the previous game/lobby
en.Help(E): Open the current room's help page
en.Direction:Up/Down/Left/Right[1]: Perform a move in the game
en.Direction:Up/Down/Left/Right[2]: Move on to the previous/next text page
en.W/A/S/D: Move the game room itself up/left/down/right. Adjust sensitivity in settings
en.Save&Replay(X): When winning, save your level progress and replay the current one

zh_cn.设置(Q/Esc)[1]: 在游戏中, 打开设置页
zh_cn.设置(Q/Esc)[2]: 在任意页, 退出到最近打开的游戏/大厅
zh_cn.帮助(H): 打开当前房间的帮助页
zh_cn.W/A/S/D: 把游戏房间本身向上/下/左/右移动. 在设置中调整敏感度
zh_cn.保存并重玩(X): 赢时, 保存关卡进度并重玩当前关卡
